scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production cd web-app && npm run build:production
scripts.tauri:build:release: cd web-app && TAURI_BUILD=true npm run build && cd .. && tauri build
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf web-app/.next web-app/out web-app/node_modules node_modules src-tauri/target
scripts.lint: echo 'No linter configured' && cd web-app && npm run lint
scripts.release:prepare: npm run clean && npm run build:production && npm run tauri:build:release
scripts.release:github: gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") src-tauri/target/release/bundle/dmg/*.dmg src-tauri/target/release/bundle/msi/*.msi src-tauri/target/release/bundle/appimage/*.AppImage --title "Ottokode v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "ðŸŽ‰ Ottokode v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") - AI-powered IDE for modern development" --repo tempandmajor/ottokode
